title: Question 10:
description: Who can invest in a pool?

fields.title: Answer
fields.value:
As a decentralized, trustless, censorship-resistant protocol, dHEDGE is open for use by any investor with an internet connection and a Web 3 wallet. 

The dHEDGE protocol supports two types of pools. A public pool is open to any investor willing to stake funds in your trading operation in pursuit of excess returns. A private pool enables a whitelisted set of Ethereum addresses to participate in your pool.
